structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Department Of The Attorney General, And The District Attorneys

law.text: Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, all registration statements, annual reports and all other information required to be filed under sections eight to eight M, inclusive, or by the division, shall be public records in the office of the division and shall be open to the general public for inspection at such time and under such conditions as the division may prescribe.
